title: Treatment of 2,4,6-tribromophenol-contaminated water using iron ion/calcium sulfite: The dual role of oxidation and coagulation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00441H, Paper
Fan Bai, ye liu, Yujie Cheng, Yingqing Guo, Zhenbin Chen, Lisan Cao, Zongping Wang, Pengchao Xie
2,4,6-tribromophenol (TBP) is widely distributed in environmental media, posing potential risks to human health and ecological systems. The efficient treatment of TBP-contaminated water is a significant challenge. In this study,...
